Description: A narrow, slick path, stained crimson as if perpetually wept upon. It winds into the gloom, promising faster passage... or a bloody end. Resolve: Non Aligned Affinities suffer 1 LE, immediately draw and resolve an additional Exploration card.
The lair of a scavenger beast, recently fed. Bones are scattered, and the stench of iron hangs heavy in the air. Resolve: Engage a Minor Threat with Blood Affinity. If victorious, draw 1 Loot Card.

A crude, blood-stained stone altar lies amidst ancient ruins. A faint warmth emanates from its surface, whispering promises of strength through sacrifice. Resolve: You may gain +1 LE. If you do, roll D6. On a 1-2, suffer 1 permanent LE (reduce Max LE). On a 3-6, gain 1 Gold.

The air in this chamber crackles with untamed fury, driving sane minds to madness. Echoes of primal screams linger. Resolve: Make a Strength check. Fail: Go Berserk gain +1 AT until the end of the next combat round.

A pulsing, vein-like tunnel, warm and moist. Every beat resonates through the stone, hinting at something vast and ancient below. Resolve: Gain 2 Gold. If your character has Blood Affinity, gain an additional 1 Gold.

A cold, silent chamber where faint, mournful sighs seem to echo from unseen walls. The air prickles with forgotten sorrows. Resolve: If you have Bone Affinity, gain a temporary Shield absorb 1 LE . Otherwise, nothing happens.
A towering structure crafted entirely from calcified remains, humming with a morbid resonance. Skeletal fragments litter its base. Resolve: Gain 10 Gold.

A chilling aura of despair fills the air, attempting to drain your will. You feel an ancient, crushing weight. Resolve: Make a Strength check. Fail: Suffer +1 Doubt. Success: Gain +1 AT bonus for your next combat.
A desecrated burial mound. Something unholy stirs within, reanimating the forgotten dead. Resolve: Engage a Minor Threat with Bone Affinity. If victorious, you may discard 1 Doubt/Corruption.
In a secluded alcove, a delicate, yet unnervingly hard flower stands, its petals like polished bone. Resolve: Gain 1 Bone-aligned Equipment Card
A narrow, dark corridor where the very air seems to hum with secrets, and unseen eyes watch your every move. Resolve: If you have Shadow Affinity, gain 10 Gold. Otherwise, nothing happens.
Shadows dance and stretch, disorienting your senses. The darkness itself seems to press in, seeking to consume. Resolve: Make an Agility check. Fail: Lose 1 AP on your next turn.

Hidden just out of sight, a small, forgotten recess contains a few items left by a previous, unfortunate explorer. Resolve: Gain 1 Equipment Card. If the card is Shadow-aligned, you may draw an additional Card.
The darkness here is absolute, suffocating. It fills your mind with irrational fears and whispers of despair. Resolve: All players in this area suffer 1 Doubt token.

The world around you shifts and distorts, the boundaries between reality and nightmare blurring. Figures dance at the edge of your vision. Resolve: Agility check. Success: You navigate the illusion safely. Fail: Suffer +1 Corruption.
A utilitarian passage of rough-hewn stone, built for endurance, not comfort. The air is still and heavy. Resolve: Gain 1 AT bonus for your next combat.

A heavily reinforced iron grate, rusted but unyielding, blocks a side passage. It rattles ominously. Resolve: Spend 2 AP or discard 1 Iron-aligned card from hand to open. Success: Gain 10 Gold. Fail: Nothing happens.
An ancient stone pillar, cracked and groaning, threatens to give way. Its collapse could trap you or create a new path. Resolve: Make a Strength check. Fail: Suffer 2 LE. Success: Nothing happens.
Amidst the rubble, a single, heavy gauntlet lies half-buried, its metal corroded but still formidable. Resolve: Gain 1 Equipment Card. If it's Iron-aligned, you may add 1 AP.

A chamber filled with dormant, giant gears and levers, hinting at a forgotten mechanism. Tampering could yield results or disaster. Resolve: Agility check. Success: You recover 1 Equipment Card. Fail: Suffer 1 LE.
A narrow, damp corridor where luminescent fungal spores drift. Breathing them in causes a light-headed disorientation. Resolve: Make an Agility check. Fail: You become Dizzy, lose 1 AP.
A winding, choked path overgrown with strangely aggressive flora and gnarled roots. Resolve: If you have Wild Affinity, Reduce Doubt by 1.
A small, subterranean spring burbles softly, its waters pure but unsettlingly cold. It seems to pulse with a primal energy. Resolve: Restore 1 LE. If you have Wild Affinity, also gain 10 Gold.

A section of the dungeon where thorny, whip-like vines have erupted from the walls, making passage perilous. Resolve: You may attempt to force through. Perform a Strength Check, failure Suffer 1 LE. If no LE is taken, draw 1 Equipment Card

A creature of pure, untamed primal fury emerges from the twisted vegetation, defending its territory with savage instinct. Resolve: Engage a Minor Threat with Wild Affinity. If victorious, draw 1 Nature-aligned Equipment Card.

Deep, ancient carvings depicting blood sacrifices adorn the walls, still glistening faintly. Stepping too close can awaken dormant energies. Resolve: Randomly choose one equipped item and discard. You may gain 1 Blood-aligned Equipment Card if Aligned.

A hulking, rage-blinded creature lunges from the shadows, its eyes burning with uncontrollable fury and its hide matted with gore. Resolve: Engage a Minor Threat with Blood Affinity. If victorious, gain +1 Corruption.

The dungeon walls here seep a viscous, crimson fluid. It's slippery underfoot and clings to everything, slowing progress. Resolve: Agility check. Success: You bypass the effect. Fail: Your next action phase has 1 less AP.

Amidst a pile of unfortunate remains, a grim relic gleams faintly, covered in dried vitae. It resonates with potent, dark power. Resolve: Gain 1 Equipment Card. If the card is Blood-aligned, gain an additional +1 AT this turn.

The ground crumbles into a vast chasm, its depths glowing with an unholy crimson light. Strange, pulsating veins line the rock, beckoning or repelling. Resolve: You may attempt to cross. Strength check (less 1 die). Success: Find a Blood-aligned Equipment Card. Fail: Suffer 2 LE.

Whispers of the long-dead swirl around you, chilling your very soul. Phantoms drift through the air, their mournful cries echoing from empty eye sockets. Resolve: Engage a Minor Threat with Bone Affinity. If victorious, collect 10 Gold.

An ominous symbol carved into the floor glows faintly, drawing you in with morbid fascination. Resolve: If you have Bone Affinity, you may attempt to decipher it. Agility Check. Success: Draw 1 Equipment Card. Fail: Suffer -1 LE.
A solemn cairn of stones, each placed with grim purpose. Placing your hand upon it reveals faint, ancient memories. Resolve: Choose one. Either gain 10 Gold, or draw 1 Loot Item Card.

A massive, intricately carved gate made of fused bones blocks your path. Ancient runes of protection are etched into its surface. Resolve: Requires 4 Strength or 1 Bone Affinity card from hand to open. Success: You bypass this obstacle. Fail: You must discard 1 equipped item.

A vast, yawning cavern filled with skeletal remains, resembling the gaping mouth of some colossal, long-dead beast. Resolve: Requires a successful  Agility check to navigate. Fail: Suffer 2 LE and gain 1 Corruption token.

A silent, shadowy figure manifests, wielding a blade that seems to absorb all light. It moves with deadly, calculated grace. Resolve: Engage a Minor Threat with Shadow Affinity. If victorious, you may draw 1 Loot card.

A vast crypt, seemingly empty, but filled with the unsettling echoes of ancient laments. Perhaps secrets linger in the silence. Resolve: You may attempt an Agility check. Success: Gain 2 Gold and 1 AP. Fail: Nothing happens.

A fleeting shadow detaches from the darkness, moving with impossible grace, its form barely discernible. It strikes from the blind spots. Resolve: Engage a Minor Threat with Shadow Affinity. If victorious, steal 5 Gold from another player.

A twisting maze of corridors, seemingly shifting as you pass through them. The air is filled with disorienting whispers. Resolve: You must discard 1 Equipment Card from your hand. If you discard a Shadow Affinity card, you may draw a new card.

A heavily concealed vault, radiating an oppressive aura. Within its depths lie forgotten treasures, but the risks are immense. Resolve: If you have Shadow Affinity, gain 1 Equipment Card. Otherwise, roll D6. On a 1-3, suffer 2 LE. On a 4-6, gain 1 Equipment Card.

A hulking automaton, crafted from heavy plates of iron, lurches into motion, its rusted joints groaning. It moves with relentless purpose. Resolve: Engage a Minor Threat with Iron Affinity. If victorious, Gain 2 LE and 15 Gold.

A massive, solid iron door, its surface scarred by countless failed attempts to breach it. It radiates stubborn resistance. Resolve: Requires a combined rank of 7 from all equipped items. Success: Gain 1  Loot Card. Fail: Nothing happens.

A colossal, inert machine of gears and pistons dominates the chamber, its purpose long forgotten but its presence menacing. Resolve: Spend 1 Iron-aligned Equpment Card from hand to activate it (gain 5 Gold). Or, suffer 2 LE attempting to bypass it.

A surprisingly well-preserved anvil stands in a dusty alcove, faintly humming with the echoes of ancient craftsmanship. Resolve: You may choose one equipped weapon. Roll D6. On a 1-3, it gains +1 AT. On a 4-6, nothing happens.

The air here shimmers with intense heat. A massive, still-glowing forge sits at the center, its arcane energies waiting to be tapped. Resolve: You may attempt to infuse an equipped Iron weapon or armor. Roll D6. On a 1-3, +1 AT . On a 4-6, -1 AT (malfunction).

A patch of grotesque, pulsing vegetation expands rapidly, attempting to ensnare anything nearby. Its tendrils lash out blindly. Resolve: Make an Agility  check. Fail: Become 'Restrained' , you can only play your first Combat Card and cannot use AP to Change it.

A small, eerily vibrant pocket of nature deep within the gloom, where the air hums with unseen life and ancient knowledge. Resolve: Gain 'Insight' you may look at the top Grim Card before the flop. If you have Nature Affinity, draw 1 random Loot card.

The sounds of the dungeon vanish, replaced by the heavy breathing of a lurking predator. You are its prey. Resolve: Engage a Minor Threat with Nature Affinity. If victorious, gain 1 Agility for the rest of your current turn.

A pocket of virulent, sickly growth infects this area, draining the vitality from the very air. Strange spores drift aimlessly. Resolve: All players in this room suffer 1 LE at the start of their turn, and further 1 LE for further combat phases, until they leave or the Blight is removed.

A raw, pulsating core of untamed natural magic, overflowing with dangerous, chaotic power. It demands respect. Resolve: You may attempt to draw from its power. Nature Affinity check (if failed, suffer 2 LE). Success: Gain 1 permanent +1 Agility OR +1 LE.
